title: Computers and you
creator_credit: Reinald Werrenrath Jr and Journal Films
brief_description: In this film a computer display terminal and diagrams are used to explain, in simple terms, how a computer works and what it can do. A clear, visual explanation of how “bits” of information are given and instructions, flow charts, and information storage methods are explained. Suitable for teachers and tertiary level students.
